document.heading: District of Columbia Protection of Minors Act of 1982

history.narrative: Law 4-173, the “District of Columbia Protection of Minors Act of 1982,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 4-305, which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on October 19, 1982, and November 16, 1982, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 8, 1982, it was assigned Act No. 4-256 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
